MCQ: What is the main focus of machine learning?
Choices: a: Imitating human behavior | b: Creating new algorithms | c: Analyzing historical data | d: Predicting future outcomes

MCQ: What does the error function in a machine learning algorithm do?
Choices: a: Evaluates the prediction of the model | b: Adjusts the weights of the model | c: Generates new data points | d: Selects the input data

MCQ: How does a machine learning algorithm optimize its model?
Choices: a: By increasing the error function | b: By repeating the evaluation process | c: By adjusting weights to reduce discrepancy | d: By ignoring known examples
